hero.title: Your Pathway to
hero.description: Carewell Supports helps you migrate, secure jobs, and travel safely with complete transparency and premium support every step of the way.

trust.title: Why Trust Carewell Supports?
trust.description: We combine technology with personalized support to make your immigration journey smooth and successful.
trust.verifiedEmployersDesc: All partner companies are thoroughly vetted and legally compliant
trust.transparentFeesDesc: Clear pricing with no hidden costs. Pay per milestone or upfront.
trust.placedDesc: Helping professionals from 45+ countries find their path.
trust.awardWinningDesc: Recognized as Top Immigration Support Service 2026.
trust.successRateDesc: Industry-leading approval rate for visa sponsorship applications.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: From application to arrival, we guide you through every step of your journey.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up with your email or social login and complete your profile with your qualifications and desired destination.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Upload your documents securely. Our AI validates them instantly and requests any missing information.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Browse verified job listings or let our smart matching system find the perfect opportunities for your skills.
howItWorks.step4Desc: We handle your visa processing and can assist with travel arrangements once everything is approved.

jobs.title: Find Your Dream Job
jobs.description: Browse hundreds of visa-sponsored positions from verified employers across USA, Canada, and UK.

about.title: About Carewell Supports
about.subtitle: Empowering dreams, connecting talent with opportunity across borders.
about.missionText: To provide transparent, affordable, and reliable immigration services that help skilled professionals achieve their dreams of working abroad.
about.visionText: A world where talent knows no borders, and everyone has equal access to global opportunities.
about.integrityDesc: We operate with complete transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for perfection in every application we process.
about.compassionDesc: We understand the emotional journey and provide caring support.
about.innovationDesc: We leverage technology to streamline and simplify processes.
